short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs all your bookmarks across devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Synchronize all your bookmarks between different browsers and devices

Core features:

- 2-way sync of your bookmarks to the cloud
- Automatic regular snapshots of your data in case of emergency data loss
- Ability to "skip" local data and not upload it to the cloud
- Up to 5 profiles for account
